jobs.title: IT Consultant
jobs.jobDescription: As an IT Consultant at UV Group, you will work closely with clients to understand their business needs and design customized IT solutions to drive their digital transformation. You will guide clients on cloud services, data analytics, and IT infrastructure optimization to ensure the highest level of performance and security.
keyResponsibilities: Collaborate with clients to assess their IT needs and develop tailored solutions.
Implement and manage cloud infrastructure and IT systems.
Provide expert advice on IT and digital transformation strategies.
Conduct training and support for clients on new technologies.
requiredSkills: Proven experience in IT consulting and cloud solutions.
Strong understanding of enterprise systems, data analytics, and IT infrastructure.
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in IT, Computer Science, or related field
Relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Microsoft Azure) are a plus
3+ years of IT consulting experience

jobs.title: Cloud Solutions Architect
jobs.jobDescription: We are seeking a Cloud Solutions Architect to design and implement scalable, secure, and high-performance cloud infrastructures for our clients. You will collaborate with various teams to ensure seamless cloud solutions that align with business objectives.
keyResponsibilities: Design and implement cloud-based solutions.
Ensure cloud security, scalability, and performance.
Work closely with development teams to integrate cloud services.
Monitor cloud infrastructure and optimize for cost and performance.
requiredSkills: Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Strong knowledge of cloud security and networking.
Experience with infrastructure as code (IaC).
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
Cloud certifications (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) are a plus
3+ years of cloud architecture experience
jobs.applyInstructions: Send your resume and cover letter to careers@uvgroup.com.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.jobDescription: We are seeking a passionate Mobile App Developer to design, develop, and maintain high-performance mobile applications. You will work on building scalable, user-friendly apps that align with client needs and business goals.
keyResponsibilities: Design and develop mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.
Collaborate with backend developers and designers to create seamless user experiences.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to app performance.
requiredSkills: Proficiency in programming languages like Swift, Kotlin, and React Native.
Experience in developing mobile applications for iOS and Android.
Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices.
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or related field
3+ years of experience in mobile app development
Experience with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.jobDescription: As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for interpreting complex data sets and transforming them into actionable insights. You will work closely with clients to analyze enterprise data, create reports, and provide recommendations to optimize their business strategies.
keyResponsibilities: Collect, analyze, and interpret large sets of data.
Provide actionable insights through data visualizations and reports.
Collaborate with teams to implement data-driven strategies.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity in reports and analyses.
requiredSkills: Proven experience as a Data Analyst or similar role.
Strong knowledge of SQL, Excel, and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI).
Ability to interpret data and provide actionable recommendations.
Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, or related field
Certification in data analytics or business intelligence (e.g., Tableau, Power BI) is a plus
2+ years of experience in data analysis

jobs.title: Enterprise Solutions Architect
jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for an Enterprise Solutions Architect to design and implement scalable enterprise-level IT solutions. You will collaborate with business and IT teams to develop customized solutions that optimize business operations and ensure long-term success.
keyResponsibilities: Design and implement enterprise-level IT solutions.
Assess business needs and provide tailored solutions.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure effective implementation.
Ensure scalability, performance, and security of IT solutions.
requiredSkills: Proven experience in enterprise-level IT architecture.
Strong knowledge of enterprise software and cloud solutions.
Experience with system integration and process optimization.
Excellent problem-solving and leadership skills.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
Enterprise architecture certifications (TOGAF, Zachman) are a plus
5+ years of experience in enterprise architecture

jobs.title: SAP Consultant
jobs.jobDescription: We are seeking an SAP Consultant to implement, configure, and optimize SAP solutions for our clients. You will work closely with clients to understand their business processes and provide effective solutions using SAP technologies.
keyResponsibilities: Implement and configure SAP solutions.
Analyze business requirements and map them to SAP functionalities.
Provide ongoing support and optimization of SAP systems.
Collaborate with clients to ensure seamless integration with other systems.
requiredSkills: Proven experience in SAP implementation and configuration.
Strong knowledge of SAP modules (e.g., SAP FICO, MM, SD).
Experience with SAP integration and data migration.
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
SAP certification is a plus
3+ years of experience as an SAP consultant

jobs.title: SEO Specialist
jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for an SEO Specialist to enhance our clients’ online visibility through effective search engine optimization strategies. You will work closely with content and development teams to optimize websites and improve organic search rankings.
keyResponsibilities: Develop and implement SEO strategies to improve organic rankings.
Perform keyword research and competitive analysis.
Optimize website content, structure, and metadata.
Monitor, analyze, and report on SEO performance and traffic metrics.
requiredSkills: Proven experience with on-page and off-page SEO.
Strong understanding of SEO tools (e.g., Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs).
Experience with content management systems (e.g., WordPress).
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
Google Analytics certification is a plus
2+ years of SEO experience

jobs.title: IT Project Manager
jobs.jobDescription: We are looking for an IT Project Manager to oversee the successful delivery of IT projects for our clients. You will manage all phases of the project lifecycle, ensuring that projects are completed on time, within scope, and on budget.
keyResponsibilities: Lead and manage IT projects from initiation to completion.
Develop project plans, timelines, and budgets.
Coordinate cross-functional teams to ensure project success.
Identify and mitigate project risks and issues.
requiredSkills: Proven experience in managing IT projects.
Strong understanding of project management methodologies (Agile, Waterfall).
Excellent communication and leadership skills.
Experience with project management software (e.g., Jira, MS Project).
qualifications: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Business, or related field
Project Management Professional (PMP) certification is a plus
5+ years of IT project management experience
